mapper.select: /* ====== kr.co.gocle.oklms.lu.planeval.service.impl.PlanEvalMapper.listNcsEvalPlanFirstInfo ====== */ select a.PLAN_EV_ID, a.YYYY, a.TERM, a.SUBJECT_CODE, a.CLASS, a.EV_DIV_CD, a.NCS_ELEM_ID, a.NCS_ELEM_NAME, a.LESSON_CN, a.INSERT_USER, b.MEM_SEQ from lms_th_ncs_plan_lrn a left outer join lms_th_first_ev_std_score b on b.PLAN_EV_ID = a.PLAN_EV_ID where 1 = 1 and a.YYYY = #{yyyy} and a.TERM = #{term} and a.SUBJECT_CODE = #{subjectCode} and a.CLASS = #{subClass} and a.EV_DIV_CD = #{evDivCd} and a.INSERT_USER = #{sessionMemSeq} ORDER BY a.NCS_ELEM_ID asc
mapper.insert: /* ====== kr.co.gocle.oklms.lu.planeval.service.impl.PlanEvalMapper.insertInsideEval ========= */ INSERT INTO LMS_INSIDE_EVAL ( INSIDE_EVAL_ID, YYYY, TERM, SUBJECT_CODE, CLASS, PLAN_TYPE, STD_MEM_SEQ, START_DATE, END_DATE, SCORE, APPLY_APPROVAL_YN, STATUS, ATCH_FILE_ID, ATCH_FILE_ID_1, ATCH_FILE_ID_2, ATCH_FILE_ID_3, INSERT_DATE, INSERT_USER ) VALUES ( #{insideEvalId}, #{yyyy}, #{term}, #{subjectCode}, #{subClass}, #{planType}, #{stdMemSeq}, #{startDate}, #{endDate}, #{score}, #{applyApprovalYn}, #{status}, #{atchFileId}, #{atchFileId1}, #{atchFileId2}, #{atchFileId3}, SYSDATE, #{sessionMemSeq} )
